name: Swarovski Crystal Bling Name Badge/Tag Holder for Lanyard (Clear Crystal & Colors)
description:
• ♥ NEW ITEM....ONE OF A KIND  ♥ •

• ♥ MADE TO ORDER!!!! ♥ •

BE THE 1st TO HAVE ONE!!! 

***************************************************

♥ If you LOVE BLING, you will love these! ♥

Very popular & selling like crazy!!! 

Add Style & a "Touch of Class" to your fashion with a beautiful Swarovski Crystal Name Badge Holder!

These Dazzling & Sparkling SWAROVSKI Crystal Name Badge/Tag Holders are custom handcrafted surrounded by beautiful Swarovski Crystals.

The badges are high quality, sturdy and are made with heavy weight vinyl with a metal clip attached. 

You feel like you are wearing a piece of jewelry instead of a name badge/tag.


♥ PERFECT ACCESSORY FOR:
===========================
ID Badges
Security Badges
Hospital Badges
Airline/Airport Badges
Credit Cards
Business Cards
Office
Functions
Conventions
Events
Meetings
Concerts
Teachers
Great for Gifts
 *** Use as a piece for jewelry or ANY Occasion or Holiday! etc...


♥ NAME BADGE COLORS AVAILABLE:
================================
Clear Crystal Color

♥ SIZE:
========
- 4 x 3 Name Badge w/metal Clip


The pictures do not do them justice....they really sparkle and are super shiny!

*** PACKAGED IN A BEAUTIFUL ORGANZA BAG W/RIBBON.****

-------------------------------------------------------

♥ PAYMENT & SHIPPING:
====================

- We accept PAYPAL only.
- Item will be shipped 3 business days after payment is clearly confirmed in PayPal

*** Please be sure your shipping address is correct in your PayPal account so we assure that your item(s) gets to you. 

------------------------------------------------

PURCHASE 1, 2, 3 or more!!!...for your family, friends, teachers, co-workers or anyone!
 
Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions..

THANK YOU FOR LOOKING!

♥ ONE OF A KIND!!!.......NEW ITEM!!! ♥

You will sparkle and shine!. . .add style & a touch of class to your fashion with a BLING lanyard & ID Name Badge!
